content: I feel like we should pause and reflect for a minute, this chat is getting very long and it's probably about to hit a limit. I made some mistakes early on that may have caused some issues and I think you learned a lot too from debugging. Do you want to continue with this approach or write up our current status and lessons learned, debugging tried back to CTO Claude? I'm just not sure how much more back and forth is required and want to make sure we capture what we can to make this smoother. I definitely think doing all file creation with cat commands needs to be required. This was one cause of the issues early on. I need to be logged out of the original Google account and only logged into the new one we created, so I've done that, but definitely would like the cat command comment in there. What do you think?
